1656270.name: Crypto Shooter Demo
1656270.description:
Crypto Shooter is a modern take on the classic fast-paced shooter gameplay. Its multiplayer gameplay features Human and AI opponents engaging in challenging and exciting matches.

Capture Bot Mode Game Mode in demo

Capture Enemy Bots by knocking them out. You can see your team color indicated on the line on the lower part of the screen. You get points for all kills by you and your captured team Bots. Enemy Bots killed by you respawn in your team. Press TAB to see the highs core.
